content: finished monkey measures approximately 8cm tall when using a 2 75mm crochet hook and dk weight yarn if you alter your yarn & hook size the monkey will vary in size this pattern is worked in a continuous round & you will need to know the following chain = chain st = stitch slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase two single crochets in to one stitch decrease = decrease single_crochet two stitches together fo = fasten_off rs= right side materials required 2 75mm hook dk acrylic or cotton yarn in 2 colours light brown beige 1 stitch marker black embroidery thread for eyes tapestry needle fiber-fill stuffing this pattern has gone through pattern testing *** the pattern and images in the pattern are property of the secret craft book distribution of the pattern in whole or part is not allowed you may sell finished items you make from this pattern but please credit me @thesecretcraftbookpatterns ***
